name: cxn-icon-repository-backend
description: Serves icon information to, and accepts updates on icons from, the front-end

scripts.watch:tests: npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch build run-tests.js"
scripts.dev: npm run compile && concurrently --kill-others "tsc --watch" "nodemon --watch build build/src/app.js"
scripts.clean:dist: rm -rf docker/dist && mkdir -p docker/dist/backend && mkdir -p docker/dist/frontend
scripts.test:package-lock: grep chemaxon package-lock.json && echo "Double-check package-lock.json" && exit 1 || echo package-lock OK
scripts.test: npm run test:package-lock && npm run lint && npm run compile && node run-tests.js
scripts.dist:backend: npm run build:backend && npm run clean:dist && cp -a package*.json docker/dist/backend/ && cp -a build/src/* docker/dist/backend/
scripts.dist:frontend: cd ../client/ && rm -rf dist && npm run build && cd - && cp -a ../client/dist/* docker/dist/frontend/
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:backend && npm run dist:frontend
scripts.build:docker: npm run dist:all && cd docker && docker build -t cxn/icon-repo-app .
scripts.pack: npm run dist:all && tar -C docker/dist -czf icon-repo-app.tgz --exclude '.DS_Store' backend frontend

author: peter.dunay.kovacs@gmail.com
